verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: When God’s assistance and victory come.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: When Allah’s assistance and victory come.

verses.verseString: And you see people entering God’s religion in multitudes.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: And you see people entering Allah’s religion in multitudes.

verses.verseString: Then, glorify the praises of your Lord, and seek His forgiveness. He is ever accepting of repentance.
